snippet: Questions grew over whether some of the units being evaluated were different than those previously installed.
abstract: Trinity Industries conducts second of eight crash tests on its ET-Plus guardrail systems, after questions arise if some units being evaluated differ from those previously installed; company is involved in whistle-blower case that alleges half of Trinity's guardrails tested in Texas exceed company's own manufacturing tolerances.
lead_paragraph: Questions grew over whether some of the units being evaluated were different than those previously installed.

headline.main: Guardrail Maker Trinity Industries Conducts More Tests for Malfunction
headline.print_headline: Guardrail Maker Conducts More Tests for Malfunction
